branchCategory.name: LVM10/100, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchCategory.description: <p>LVM10/100 is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. Operating pressure ranges from -75 kPa&nbsp;to 0.25 MPa. LVM10/100 is available as body ported, direct tube connection or base mounted.</p>

breadCrumb.name: LVM10/100, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
